description:
Neo4j (>= 3.5) monitoring dashboard, with Prometheus data source.
Read more at https://graphaware.com/neo4j/2019/06/11/monitoring-neo4j-prometheus.html

panels.description: Boolean status of the Neo4j server
panels.title: $neo4j_instance Status

panels.description: Total number of graph items: node, relationships, ...
panels.title: Counters of Graph Items

panels.description: Per-second Average Rate of Increase of Data Counters
panels.title: Graph Items Creation Rate (ids)

panels.description:
This is in reality the change in neo4j ids.
If the transaction is rolled-back nodes will not be created but will increase this gauge.

Maximum speed is set to 30k nodes/sec
Empirically we saw this is the maximum handled by the production machine
panels.title: Node creation speed (ids)

panels.description:
This is in reality the change in neo4j ids.
If the transaction is rolled-back nodes will not be created but will increase this gauge.

Maximum speed is set to 30k nodes/sec
Empirically we saw this is the maximum handled by the production machine
panels.title: Relationship creation speed (ids)

panels.description:
This is in reality the change in neo4j ids.
If the transaction is rolled-back nodes will not be created but will increase this gauge.

Maximum speed is set to 30k nodes/sec
Empirically we saw this is the maximum handled by the production machine
panels.title: Property creation speed (ids)

panels.description:
Neo4j Checkpoints. 
Checkpointing is the process of flushing all pending page updates from the page cache to the store files
panels.title: Checkpoints
